```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

df <- data.frame(read.csv2(file = "flight.csv", sep= ",",header = TRUE)) %>% na.omit()
names(df)[1:2] <- c("Airlines", "Status")
df[c(2,4),1] <- c("ALASKA", "AM WEST")


tidy.data <- gather(df,City, flight_num , 3:7 )

tidy.data %>% group_by(Airlines,Status) %>% summarise(Total = sum(flight_num))
```
